ProductInfo.Features:
H.264 video compression. D1/Half D1/CIF resolution. VGA output: 1024x768 resolution
Efficiently recorded video by time and event list. User-friendly graphical user interface
Can be controlled by mouse and IR remote (remote control included).Internet monitoring function
Recording can be triggered manually, by motion or by schedule for real-time or time lapse recording
Multi-operational mode: live viewing, recording, playback, networking and backup can all be performed simultaneously
ProductInfo.Name: Astak CCTV 4 Channel Video Audio H.264 Real-time Security Surveillance DVR system with 500GB Hard Drive, Network and Internet Viewing Monitoring System Support Remote/Mouse with 4 Indoor/Outdoor Hi-Res Night Vision Cameras (DVR+Four 420 TVL Cameras)
